item.description:
Living Light Chef Showcase
3 Day event of 12 Raw Chefs Online
August 27 through 29



How would you like to have a private chef teach you how to create delicious gourmet meals in the comfort of your own home? How about having 12 of the world’s top vibrant living chefs at your house for 3 full days?

Most people only dream about such opportunities… They want to start eating more healthfully but they don’t know how… or they incorrectly think that they don’t have time.

Throw away those limiting beliefs because this August 27-29, Living Light International, the world’s premier gourmet raw food culinary school, will be hosting
The Living Light Chef Showcase: Hot Chefs, Cool Kitchen
...three days of non-stop demos, taught by 12 of the world's top Hot Raw Chefs!

This is an event that will show you step-by-step, with state of the art camera close-ups, how to make healthful, delicious food. Even if you’ve never eaten much uncooked vegan food before, you’ll be surprised and amazed at how easy it is and how good it can taste.

<object width="470" height="264"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="470" height="264" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>

Gone are the days when eating healthfully makes you feel deprived. At the Living Light Chef Showcase: Hot Chefs, Cool Kitchen, you’ll learn incredible recipes for healthy, nurturing comfort food that is filling and flavorful. You will see a wide variety of cuisine demonstrated from easy to gourmet, including delicious gluten-free and low-glycemic recipes.

Free online video alternative of raw chefs
www.HotRawChef.com

Register for this event here...
www.HotChefsCoolKitchen.com
The event costs $157 to be paid online at time of registration.

(Starting time unknown, register for the event to find out the event times. The 12 PM time posted above is only included because Meetup.com requires each event to post a time for an event.)

Raw Recipes PDF
www.HotRawChef.com/pdfs/Video_Contest_Recipes_2010.pdf
item.name: Living Light Chef Showcase - 12 Raw Chefs Online; 3 Days, August 27-29
